title: Fan List: Directing fan to F2F for listing from Ballpark App
custom_preconds:
[ENTIX-206](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/ENTIX-206 )
[ENTIX-110](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/ENTIX-110 )
[ENTIX-111](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/ENTIX-111 )

GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into BP app [Android: 12.11.0 or Greater, iOS 12.4.0 or greater]
AND User has verified their account via MLB.com
AND User has tickets that are eligible to be sold
custom_steps: WHEN user wants to list a ticket to be resold
custom_expected: THEN user should be notified they are being redirected to SeatGeek's ticket listing page

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user is viewing Sell View from BP app
WHEN user selects ticket to be resold
AND user taps 'Sell Tickets' from BP app Sell View
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be notified (display consent text) they are being redirected to SeatGeek's ticket listing page

Prompt Shown:
**Header** 
Sell your tickets on SeatGeek

**Subheading**
"MLB will share your account & ticket details with SeatGeek for use per seatgeek.com/privacy. To manage your ticket, you must remove it from sale on SeatGeek."

CTAs - Cancel, Sell Ticket

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user is viewing Sell View from BP app
WHEN user selects ticket to be resold
AND user taps 'Sell Tickets' from BP app Sell View
AND user taps 'Cancel' CTA from SG prompt
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is returned back to Sell View in Ballpark App
AND user's inventory is unchanged

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user is viewing Sell View from BP app
WHEN user selects ticket to be resold
AND user taps 'Sell Tickets' from BP app Sell View
AND user taps 'Sell Ticket' CTA from SG prompt
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN Ballpark will open a webview and direct the fan to a specified URL 

URLs for reference: 
* QA / Staging/ non-production -> https://mlb2.tixcast.com/api/webhooks/dc/mlb/sell
Production ->   SG ticket listing page (possibly https://seatgeek.com/sell/mlb)

title: Fan List: Ballpark App provides SG with ticket and Seller information
custom_preconds:
[ENTIX-112](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/ENTIX-112 )


GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into BP app [Android: 12.11.0 or Greater, iOS 12.4.0 or greater]
AND User has verified their account via MLB.com
AND User has tickets that are eligible to be sold
custom_steps:
WHEN user lists a ticket to be resold
AND user selects “sell tickets” on the redirect modal
custom_expected: THEN Ballpark will send ticket metadata via signed, encoded JWT token to SG

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user is viewing Sell View from BP app
WHEN user selects ticket to be resold
AND user taps 'Sell Tickets' from BP app Sell View
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be notified (display consent text) they are being redirected to SeatGeek's ticket listing page

Prompt Shown:
Header
Sell your tickets on SeatGeek

Subheading
"MLB will share your account & ticket details with SeatGeek for use per seatgeek.com/privacy. To manage your ticket, you must remove it from sale on SeatGeek."

CTAs - Cancel, Sell Ticket

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps 'Sell Ticket' CTA from SG prompt
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN Ballpark will send ticket metadata via signed, encoded JWT token to SG

[this can be confirmed w/ Proxy shows tesla_marketplace_query_param(eter) when directing to SG page]

title: Fan List: List a ticket for Resale from Ballpark App
custom_preconds:
[ENTIX-206](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/ENTIX-206 )
[ENTIX-110](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/ENTIX-110 )
[ENTIX-111](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/ENTIX-111 )
[ENTIX-112](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/ENTIX-112 )

GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into BP app [Android: 12.11.0 or Greater, iOS 12.4.0 or greater]
AND User has verified their account via MLB.com
AND User has tickets that are eligible to be sold
custom_steps:
WHEN user lists a ticket to be resold
AND user is directed to SG page and completes out ticket listing

AND WHEN user returns to Ballpark
custom_expected: THEN Ballpark's Ticket ListView reflects the status of the ticket listed

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user is viewing Sell View from BP app
WHEN user selects ticket to be resold
AND user taps 'Sell Tickets' from BP app Sell View
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be notified (display consent text) they are being redirected to SeatGeek's ticket listing page

Prompt Shown:
Header
Sell your tickets on SeatGeek

Subheading
"MLB will share your account & ticket details with SeatGeek for use per seatgeek.com/privacy. To manage your ticket, you must remove it from sale on SeatGeek."

CTAs - Cancel, Sell Ticket

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps 'Sell Ticket' CTA from SG prompt
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is now within SG flow

(SG acct creation can be performed, if not prev created)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user complete the ticket listing from within SG flow
AND user returns to Ballpark
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Ballpark's Ticket ListView reflects the status of the ticket listed

title: Fan Access: Ballpark App reflects Listing status change from MPV
custom_preconds:
[ENTIX-99](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/ENTIX-99 )

GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into MLB acct on MPV  (https://mpvsb.tickets.com/?agency=MLBM_MYTIXX&orgid=48650#/auth/login)
AND user has tickets that are eligible to be sold
AND user lists a ticket to be resold from within MPV
AND user is directed to SG page AND completes out ticket listing




[2024+QA+Test+Data](https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ticketing/pages/3119907184/2024+QA+Test+Data )
custom_steps: WHEN user views ticketed event w/in Ballpark
custom_expected: THEN Ballpark's Ticket ListView reflects the status of the ticket listed from w/in MPV

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user access tickets from MPV (https://mpvsb.tickets.com/?agency=MLBM_MYTIXX&orgid=48650#/auth/login )
AND user attempts listing a ticket from MPV (directing to SG)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the selected ticket(s) is listed for resale

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is viewing Ticket ListView from BP app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Ballpark's Ticket ListView reflects the status of the ticket listed

title: Fan Access: Ballpark App reflects Listing status change from SeatGeek
custom_preconds:
[ENTIX-162](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/ENTIX-162 )

GIVEN Uuer has successfully authenticated into SG/MLB acct on SeatGeek 
AND user has tickets that are eligible to be sold
AND user lists a ticket to be resold from within SG
custom_steps: WHEN user views ticketed event w/in Ballpark
custom_expected: THEN Ballpark's Ticket ListView reflects the status of the ticket listed from w/in SG

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user access tickets from SG (QA env: https://mlb2.tixcast.com/account/tickets/6258016 )
AND user attempts listing a ticket from SG
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the selected ticket(s) is listed for resale

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is viewing Ticket ListView from BP app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Ballpark's Ticket ListView reflects the status of the ticket listed

title: Fan Access: Ballpark App reflects Cancelled Listing status change from SeatGeek
custom_preconds:
[ENTIX-397](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/ENTIX-397 )

GIVEN user has successfully authenticated into SG/MLB acct on SeatGeek 
AND user has tickets that are eligible to be sold
AND user lists a ticket to be resold from within SG
custom_steps: WHEN user cancels the listing within SG
custom_expected: THEN the fan sees the updated status of the ticket in Ballpark

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user prev listed tickets from SG
WHEN user cancels(de-list) the listing within SG
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the selected ticket(s) are no longer listed for resale

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views ticketed event w/in Ballpark
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Ballpark's Ticket ListView reflects the status of the ticket listed (ticket is no longer listed)

title: Fan Access: Listed ticket on SeatGeek prevents BallPark app from triggering Ticket Actions (Forward, Recall, De-list)
custom_preconds:
[ENTIX-396](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/ENTIX-396 )

GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into SG/MLB acct on SeatGeek 
AND user has tickets that are eligible to be sold
AND user lists a ticket to be resold from within SG
custom_steps: WHEN user views ticketed event w/in Ballpark
custom_expected:
THEN Ballpark's Ticket ListView reflects the status of the ticket listed from w/in SG
AND Ballpark prevents user from performing ticket actions

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user has a standard ticket (Not in forwarding state, Not in listed for resale state)
WHEN user accesses the ticket
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is able to view the barcode
AND user is able to forward the ticket
AND user is able to list the ticket for resale

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user has a standard ticket (Not in forwarding state, Not in listed for resale state)
WHEN user lists the ticket for resale
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is able to view the barcode
AND user is UNABLE to forward the ticket
AND user is UNABLE to list the ticket for sale (again)
AND user is UNABLE to de-list the ticket from within Ballpark

title: Fan Access: Locked ProVenue account prevents Ballpark App from navigating to List ticket for Sale
custom_preconds:
[ENTIX-221](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/ENTIX-221 )

GIVEN a fan is the financial rights holder of a ticket 
AND that fan is viewing their ticket inventory on Ballpark 
AND that fan’s ProVenue account is locked

[TODO: how to cause an account to be locked?]
custom_steps:
WHEN user views ticketed event w/in Ballpark
AND user attempts to list the ticket for sale via SG flow
custom_expected: Then the fan is prevented from navigating to SG

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user's PV acct is locked
WHEN user is viewing Ticket ListView from BP app
AND user attempts to list a ticket for resale
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN Ballpark app prevents the ticket listing

*iOS and Android client may have slightly different UI presentations, but key aspect to validate is that the ticket cannot be listed via SG flow

title: [Android] TESLA Analytics
custom_preconds:
**TESTING NOTES: THIS CASE REQUIRES TRACKING TO BE VERIFIED - MOST DIRECT WAY TO ACHIEVE THIS IS VIA A PROXY TOOL (.I.E. CharlesProxy)
Setup: Connect to device to Charles to monitor the content passed.

GIVEN the Ballpark application has the TESLA enabled
AND the user downloaded the Ballpark app (iOS: 12.4.0 or greater, Android: 12.12 or greater)
AND the user has tickets already added to the BP account  (TDC events)
AND the Remote Config configuration for [tesla_marketplace_url is true)
AND network traffic is monitored via Proxy tool (such as Charles/Proxyman)
custom_steps: WHEN accessing/viewing Tickets events within BP app

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user has navigated to TicketsTab
AND User is on Wallet -> List View
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed into  webpage
AND Tracking info is posted to https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net verified via proxy tool

*MLB Ballpark : Tickets : Wallet : List View

** Shown: pageName=MLB Ballpark : Tickets : Wallet : List View

GIVEN user has navigated to TicketsTab
WHEN user taps “Open Tickets” for TDC club event from Wallet -> List View
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed into  webpage
AND Tracking info is posted to https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net verified via proxy tool

*MLB Ballpark : Tickets : Wallet : List View : Open Click

GIVEN user has navigated to TicketsTab
WHEN user taps “Sell Tickets” for TDC club event from Wallet -> List View
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed into  webpage
AND Tracking info is posted to https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net verified via proxy tool

*MLB Ballpark : Tickets : Wallet : List View : Sell Tickets Click

WHEN user taps “Forward Tickets” for TDC club event from Wallet -> List View
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed into  webpage
AND Tracking info is posted to https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net verified via proxy tool

title: Ticket is actively listed on SeatGeek, ticket cannot be listed elsewhere or relisted on SeatGeek
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User on Ballpark app (Android 13.4 & iOS 13.2.1 above) 

Context: Box Office is updating the flag needed to determine eligibility for listing tickets on SeatGeek. This replaces the current flag of “resellable”. 



Flag resellableOnExclusiveMarketplace: 
**
Note**
Status of True = Ticket is eligible for listing 
Status of False = Ticket is not eligible for listing
custom_steps:
GIVEN the user  ticket is actively listed on SeatGeek, ticket cannot be listed elsewhere or relisted on SeatGeek
WHEN the user view listed ticket w/in Ballpark list view
custom_expected:
THEN Ballpark's Ticket ListView reflects the status of the ticket listed from w/in MPV
AND user display with `Go to Secondary Market to manage selling this ticket` display for ticket listed by fan on ticket listed on SG
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14305210)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user select Sell Tickets CTA
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user taken to Sell Tickets page with list of ticket/tickets(This can be depend on user inventory)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is viewing Sell Tickets View from BP app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user should not see radio button for list/relist the ticket 
AND Sell Tickets CTA remain grayed out for ticket listed on SG (IF user has inventory eligible for listed that will shown with standard radio button unselected) [ANDROID ONLY - iOS does not gray out the ticket] 
AND that particular ticket listing is  prevented 
AND user display with `Go to Secondary Market to manage selling this ticket` display for ticket listed by fan on ticket listed on SG

![](index.php?/attachments/get/14305211)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14305234)

iOS:
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14312708)

title: Ticket is actively listed on StubHub, ticket is eligible for listing on SeatGeek but not elsewhere
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User on Ballpark app (Android 13.4 & iOS 13.2.1 above)

Context: Box Office is updating the flag needed to determine eligibility for listing tickets on SeatGeek. This replaces the current flag of “resellable”.

Flag resellableOnExclusiveMarketplace:
**
Note**
Status of True = Ticket is eligible for listing
Status of False = Ticket is not eligible for listing

Note: Only validate with any one of the market places except SG
custom_steps:
GVIEN The user ticket is actively listed on StubHub(OR any other market place such as Ticket Evolution, Gametime), ticket is eligible for listing on SeatGeek but not elsewhere
WHEN the user view the listed ticket w/in Ballpark list view
custom_expected:
THEN Ballpark's Ticket ListView reflects the status of the ticket listed from w/in MPV
AND user display with Go to Secondary Market to manage selling this ticket display for ticket listed by fan on ticket listed on SG
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14305235)

iOS:
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14312711)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user select Sell Tickets CTA
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user taken to Sell Tickets page with list of ticket/tickets(This can be depend on user inventory)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is viewing Sell Tickets View from BP app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user should see radio button for list/relist the ticket
AND Sell Tickets CTA highlighted 
AND that particular ticket listing is eligible to list on SG
AND user display with Go to Secondary Market to manage selling this ticket display for ticket listed by fan on ticket listed on SG

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user select particular ticket listed on Stubhub 
AND taps on 'Sell Tickets' CTA from BP Sell View
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be notified (display consent text) they are being redirected to SeatGeek's ticket listing page

Sell your tickets on SeatGeek

Subheading
"MLB will share your account & ticket details with SeatGeek for use per seatgeek.com/privacy. To manage your ticket, you must remove it from sale on SeatGeek."

CTAs - Cancel, Sell Ticket

GIVEN user is viewing Sell View from BP app
WHEN user selects ticket to be resold
AND user taps 'Sell Tickets' from BP app Sell View
AND user taps 'Cancel' CTA from SG prompt
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is returned back to Sell View in Ballpark App
AND user's inventory is unchanged

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user is viewing Sell View from BP app
WHEN user selects ticket to be resold
AND user taps 'Sell Tickets' from BP app Sell View
AND user taps 'Sell Ticket' CTA from SG prompt
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN Ballpark will open a webview and direct the fan to a specified URL

URLs for reference:
* QA / Staging/ non-production -> https://mlb2.tixcast.com/api/webhooks/dc/mlb/sell
Production -> SG ticket listing page (possibly https://seatgeek.com/sell/mlb)
